name: VEVOR Deep Well Submersible Pump, 1 HP Output Power, 115V, 31.7 GPM Flow 207 ft Head, with 32.81 ft Cord External Control Box, Stainless Steel Water Pump, for Industrial Irrigation and Home Use, IP68
short_description: Large Flow, High Lift: This deep well submersible pump delivers 1.8HP input power and 1HP output, offering exceptional flow and lift capabilities. With a maximum lift of 207 ft (63 m) and a flow rate of up to 31.7 GPM, it meets a wide range of water supply needs. Enjoy strong water pressure and a continuous, reliable flow across multiple applications.

With External Control Box: This deep well pump comes with an external control box for easy operation and maintenance. Featuring a copper motor, it provides strong, stable water flow, ensuring reliable performance for all your water needs.

Powerful Pure Copper Motor: Equipped with a copper wire motor, this deep well submersible water pump delivers strong and stable water flow. The motor is designed with overheat protection to avoid overheating, ensuring optimal performance for reliable, long-lasting operation.

Built to Last, Corrosion-Resistant: Designed for durability, our deep well submersible pump boasts an IP68 waterproof rating and is crafted with stainless steel stainless steel connection and filtration mesh. This corrosion-resistant construction resists rust and keeps debris out, effectively protecting the motor.

Ideal for Any Water Source: Our deep well pump is built to handle a variety of water sources, making it ideal for agricultural irrigation, livestock watering, residential water supply, river extraction, and pond maintenance. Warning: Put a layer of gauze at the inlet for a new drilled well. Ensure your well casing diameter exceeds the pump diameter by at least 0.39 in/10 mm for optimal fit. Do not use it without water or at low water levels to avoid burning.

name: Green Expert 1HP Submersible Sump Pump 4000GPH High Flow Full Stainless Steel 25FT Power Cord Fast Water Drainage for Flood Pool Garden Pond Hot Tub Rain Barrel Heater Flush Household Drain System
short_description: 【Powerful Pump with High Performance】 This water pump features an advanced oil-free PSC motor with 1.0 HP output power, delivering exceptional performance and efficiency. Its straight-through design enhances energy savings and quiet operation while optimizing flow. Capable of lifting water up to 32 feet vertically, it delivers a max flow of 4000GPH at zero feet and maintains 3000 gallons per hour at a 10-foot lift. It’s an ideal and reliable choice for various household DIY applications.

【Effortless Plug-and-play Functionality】 Plug it in and the pump starts working immediately, lowering water levels to just 0.8 inches. It’s a fast and efficient solution as a handy and quick-to-use utility pump for draining water from flooded homes, basements, sumps, window wells, cisterns, and other low-lying areas. It’s also ideal for flushing tankless water heaters, operating hydroponic systems, draining pools and hot tubs, and maintaining clean water in small ponds or fountains.

【Full Stainless Steel Design】 The pump is meticulously assembled with an integrated 304 stainless steel housing and base, offering a tough, shining appearance. It features full corrosion-resistant construction and enhanced cooling for extended life, ensuring durability in continuous water removal applications. Equipped with thermal overload protection, it’s built for reliable, long-term use.

【Easy and Safe to Use】 This compact pump features a lengthened 25-foot grounded waterproof cord and a portable handle for easy and safe installation from a distance, eliminating the trouble and danger of using extension cords. Its cylindrical design with top discharge minimizes installation space and fits easily into narrow pits for hassle-free water drainage.

【Simple to Hookup】 Includes three plastic adapters for versatile pumping options: 1" and 1-1/4" barb fittings for discharge hoses, perfect for high-capacity pumping; plus 3/4" GHT and 1-1/4" NPT fittings for garden and threaded hoses. These fittings simplify quick installations. *For optimal performance, avoid using expandable or retractable hoses, as they may hinder the pump's full capability.

name: Water Transfer Garden Pump, 1.6 HP 1000GPH Portable Electric Shallow Well Jet Pump, Stainless Steel Sprinkler Pressure Booster Pump for Pool Draining, Lawn Fountain, Irrigation, Water Removal
short_description: 【1.6HP Powerful Water Pump】 KITLUCK Water Transfer Garden Pump is equipped with a highly efficient power motor. Operating on 115 volts, with 1.6HP power, the electric shallow well jet pump can transfer max 1000 gallons of water per hour, lift water up to 150 feet. In addition, the max suction lift: 26.3 Feet, hose connection: 1″NPT and 3/4″NPT.

【Durable and Portable】 KITLUCK water sprinkler jet pump head is manufactured in stainless steel and body is manufactured in aluminum alloy, which is durable, wear-resistant, rust-resistant, easy to maintain and ensures an extension of service life. Excellent construction and design gives it a top-notch seal with virtually no chance of leakage. With the portable handle and the 6.6ft cord, this garden pressure booster pump is easy to carry where you need it and saving storage space.

【More thoughtful design】 More than other pumps, our shallow well water pump comes with a unique set of fittings for your water inlet hose, which includes a 1″ Inlet Water Hose Adapter and a 1″ Filter with Non-return Valve Connector. This set has a filtering function that prevents contaminants from entering the pump and reduces the risk of clogging the motor. In addition, the 3/4″ NPT Garden Hose Adapter allows you to switch between the 1″ outlet and inlet for multiple connections.

【Multiple Application】 KITLUCK shallow well pump works efficiency in water transfer for daily use, farmland long-distance water diversion, sprinkler systems, pipeline booster liquid delivery, garden large area sprinkler irrigation. It is a versatile pump for irrigation or water transport in garden or farm, you can use for shallow wells, ponds, pools, flow irrigation systems, gardening, rain barrels, water tanks for such agriculture settings.

【Remind】Before use, the pump head must be filled with water and it is recommended that the inlet pipe be filled with water as well. After use, waste water must be drained. After connecting the water pipe, please check the sealing, it is recommended to use sealing tape.

【What Included In Kit】 We've included 1* KITLUCK Electric Water Transfer Garden Pump, 2* 3/4″ NPT Garden Hose Adapter, 1* 1″ Inlet Water Hose Adapter, 1* 1″ Filter with Non-return Valve Connector, 1* Teflon Thread Sealing Tape, 1* Use Manual
